Data Fields
rtc_time_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Real Time Clock (RTC)

RTC Time Structure (compatible with struct tm from time.h) More...

#include <rtc.h>

Detailed Description

This structure holds the time. It should be compatible with struct tm.

Data Fields

struct link_tm time
 Time (compatible with struct tm) used with set/get.
 
u32 useconds
 Microseconds used with set/get.
